metadata.title: CVE-2024-26767 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: fixed integer types and null check locations [why]: issuesfixed: - comparison with wider integer type in loop condition which cancause infinite loops - pointer dereference before null check

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
